titleStmt.title: Sir Thomas Levingstons letter to the Honourable Major General MacKay, Commander in Chief of Their Majesties forces in Scotland giving a true account of the Battel at Crombdel, with the number kill'd, and prisoners taken, as likewise a list of the names of the officers that was taken May the first, 1690 : from the copy printed in Scotland.
titleStmt.author: Levingston, Thomas, Sir.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
